data.text: -Yeah, this is just -- -Explain to me.

data.text: -Well, "Mother" was like -- and you'll hear it tonight.

translation.text: -Vâng, "Mẹ" giống như - và bạn sẽ nghe thấy nó tối nay.

data.text: It was the first time that I dreamt a melody.

translation.text: Đó là lần đầu tiên tôi mơ thấy một giai điệu.

data.text: And it's a complete mixolydian scale in F-sharp major,

data.text: and it goes -- [ Humming musical scale ]

data.text: and there were bagpipes. It was in 3/4 timing.

translation.text: và đã có bagpipes. Đó là trong thời gian 3/4.

data.text: It went -- [ Humming melody ]

data.text: [ Laughter ] -And I woke up,

data.text: and I told my friends, "Oh, my God.

translation.text: -Yeah. Đó là cách tôi nảy ra ý tưởng,

data.text: -And I just -- That's how I produce records.

data.text: Thank you.

title: Charlie Puth Reviews His Junior High Christmas Albums and Tests His Perfect Pitch
